A form of reconciliation of lapsed Protestants and of admission of Romanists to the communion of the Church of Ireland / written by the Right Reverend Father in God Anthony Lord Bishop of Meath. Dopping, Anthony, 1643-1697.
[2], 86 p.
Printed and are to be sold by Andrew Crook ... and by Eliphal Dobson ..., Dublin : 1691.
Reproduction of original in Marsh's Library.
=======
